casebody.data:
STATE
v.
DAWSON 2018-1740 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Donnelly, J., dissents. DONNELLY, J., dissenting.

{¶ 1} I would grant jurisdiction in this case and hold it for our decision in State v. Gwynne, case No. 2017-1506. Based on the pro se memorandum in support of jurisdiction, this case appears to raise the same substantive issue as Gwynne. I would also appoint counsel to brief this significant issue.
